citation.article-title: Corynebacterium amycolatum sp. nov. a new mycolic acid-less Corynebacterium species from human skin

p.s: Description of Corynebacterium amycolatum sp. nov.
(a. my. col. a. tum M.L. adj. amycolatus wanting in mycolates)
Cells are gram-positive, non-acid fast, nonmotile pleomorphic rods.
Grows at 37 ° but not at 10°C; some strains grow at 40°C.
Grows in 5% NaCl; some strains grow in 10% NaCl.
Facultatively anaerobic.
Catalase-positive and oxidase negative.
Acid is produced from D-fructose, D-glucose, glycerol, D-mannose and ribose.
Most strains produce acid from maltose.
Some strains produce acid from sucrose and trehalose.

Acid is not produced from N-acetylglucosamine, amidon, amygdaline, D-arabinose, L-arabinose, D-arabitol, L-arabitol, arbutin, cellobiose, D-fucose, L-fucose, galactose, β-gentiobiose, glycogen, gluconate, 2-ceto-gluconate, 5-ceto-gluconate, inositol, inulin, lactose, D-lyxose, mannitol, melezitose, melibiose, α-methyl-D-glucoside, α-methyl-D-mannoside, β-methyl xyloside, D-raffinose, rhanmose, salicin, sorbitol, L-sorbose, xylitol, D-xylose and L-xylose.
Aesculin, arginine, casein, cellulose, gelatin, ornithine, tyrosine and xanthine are not hydrolysed.
Starch is hydrolysed.
Some strains hydrolyse hippurate.
Some strains produce urease and H2S.

Cystine arylamidase, α-fucosidase, α-galactosidase, β-galactosidase, α-glucosidase, β-glucosidase, β-glucuronidase, lecithinase, leucine arylamidase, a-mannosidase, sulfatase, and valine arylamidase negative.
Voges-Proskauer and methyl red positive.
Cell wall peptidoglycan contains meso-diaminopimelic acid, alanine and glutamic acid.
Arabinose and galactose are wall sugars.
Mycolic acids are not present.
The cellular fatty acids are primarily the straight-chain saturated and monounsaturated types with hexadecanoic (C16:0), octadecanoic (C18:0) and octadecenoic (C18:1) acids the major components.
The type strain produces acid from trehalose.
Acid is not produced from sucrose.
Urease is produced.
Hippurate is not hydrolysed.
The principal menaquinone is MK-9(H2).
The mol% G + C content of DNA is 61 (Tm).
The type strain is NCFB 2768 (= S160)
